dcterms:description: Local models of users are utilized in the proposed SwiftAgg protocol for secure aggregation in federated learning, allowing for privacy-preserving model aggregation.

dcterms:description: Random vectors are used in the context of federated learning to analyze potential privacy leakage through gradients.
